name: Hamster Dash (Samzz)
description:
Hamster Dash

This is the real deal. It's time for the ultimate Hamster Dash competition! Go as fast as you can, collect more time eating some coin cookies, be cute while you're at it, and most importantly, avoid falling on the water. Why? well... Some times Turtle the lifeguard falls asleep... but don't worry, you'll be just fine! Have fun, and be the fastest (and cutest) hamster!

Movement keys Features

Time limit
Random levels
A lifeguard named Turtle

and...

A cute Hamster!

This is my first officially shared little game, it started as an university project and I loved the result! But Hamster Dash still has a lot of things I can improve, of that there's no doubt. For now, here you have a little try of what I've been working on!

Have fun! :D

❤

Credits

Samzz

Game sounds

Delightful by Ahjay Stelino
